metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Area 1 (The Paleozoic Era) - Dragon Spirit has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody and below-average scores in Chord-Melody Tension.
key_conclusion:
Area 1 (The Paleozoic Era) - Dragon Spirit is written in the key of C Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most common key in all of popular music. 

See the C Major Cheat Sheet for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
